snippet: Lucasfilm, the studio behind the "Star Wars" saga, said it would not build a new facility in Marin County, Calif., saying that it feared alienating neighbors and wanted to work with "communities that see us as a creative asset, not as an evil...
abstract: Lucasfilm, the studio behind the "Star Wars" saga, said it would not build a new facility in Marin County, Calif., saying that it feared alienating neighbors and wanted to work with "communities that see us as a creative asset, not as an evil empire."

headline.main: Lucasfilm Cancels Plans for New Studio in Northern California
headline.print_headline: Lucasfilm Cancels Plans For Marin County Studio
